name: Hamburger in Hell
description:
Hamburger in Hell
Shoot the donuts, and don't fall!
designed for Ludum Dare 31 (DEC 05-08 2014)
The theme was "Entire Game on One Screen".
Requires .NET and XNA redistributables.

Design: Zeipher, Anotak
Additional Design: Dantarion
Programming: Anotak
Art: Zeipher
Additional Programming: Dantarion
Music: The Initiar Lifestyle
